overview:
Kojami transforms ANY event into an Interactive, Media Capable, Mobile Experience for Event Organizers and Mobile Phone Users

Kojami Inc, a mobile-centric technology company has launched its offering of a mobile event management system into public beta. Kojami is a mobile solution that captures the power of mobile marketing to enhance the event industry for both organizers and attendees. For event organizers, the service is a cost-effective way to create, manage and market events, as well as provide real time interaction with their attendees. Their attendees can utilize Kojami to simply discover, shove, and experience events at anytime, from anywhere on any smartphone, with the touch of a finger. With millions of individuals, organizations, small businesses and corporations seeking or creating events every day, marketing professionals need to shorten the gap between the moment attendees learn about an event and when they decide to take action.

The industry has lacked a comprehensive mobile solution, but with the number of smartphones predicted to quadruple to an estimated 200 million in USA or more by 2014, Kojami has created an effective mobile system that enhances the entire event cycle for organizers from creation and planning, through tracking and communication, to post evaluation and reporting. Kojami features include; An Events Search Engine allows users to find events based on date, time, location and category and then receive future alerts for their preferred events. On the day and time of event, a GPS feature navigates users to the venue easily.

Organizers and attendees can upload photos and video to create an interactive experience, motivating others to join event in real-time. Additionally, all users can instantly forwardmobile events to other smartphones, email addresses and social networks. Attendees can also create a copy of the event and personalize it as their own sub-event to motivate personal networks to attend. Finally, a user-friendly Attendance Management Panel enables event organizers to communicate before, during and after the event with those that RSVP or have purchased tickets and manage participants during the event. With Kojamiâ€™s streamlined and instantaneous process, events organizers can reach millions of potential attendees much more effectively and efficiently, while reducing that cost and preparation time. Visit kojami.com and see events currently being mobilized daily on Twitter.com/KojamiEvents.
